DOC.brief_summary: The goal of this project is to investigate whether a pre-visit telephone intervention could increase awareness of long-acting reversible contraception (LARC) availability at the time of uterine evacuation.
DOC.brief_title: Contraceptive Choice at the Time of Uterine Evacuation
DOC.criteria: Age 18 or older Scheduled for uterine evacuation Speaks English proficiently in order to understand the telephone conversation and the survey questions. Previous participation in this study
